trans-unit.source: Azure Mobile Engagement User Interface - Reach
trans-unit.target: Azure Mobile Engagement User Interface - Reach

trans-unit.source: Learn how to reach out to the users of your application with push notifications using Azure Mobile Engagement
trans-unit.target: Learn how to reach out to the users of your application with push notifications using Azure Mobile Engagement

trans-unit.source: How to reach out to the users of your application with push notifications
trans-unit.target: How to reach out to the users of your application with push notifications

trans-unit.source: The Reach section of the UI is the Push campaign management tool where you can create/edit/activate/finish/monitor and get statistics on Push notification campaigns and features that can also be accessed via the Reach API (and some elements of the low level Push API).
trans-unit.target: The Reach section of the UI is the Push campaign management tool where you can create/edit/activate/finish/monitor and get statistics on Push notification campaigns and features that can also be accessed via the Reach API (and some elements of the low level Push API).

trans-unit.source: Remember that whether you are using the APIs or the UI, you will need to integrate both Azure Mobile Engagement and Reach into your application for each platform with the SDK before you can use Reach campaigns.
trans-unit.target: Remember that whether you are using the APIs or the UI, you will need to integrate both Azure Mobile Engagement and Reach into your application for each platform with the SDK before you can use Reach campaigns.

trans-unit.source: See also
trans-unit.target: See also

trans-unit.source: [API Documentation - Reach API][Link 4], [API Documentation - Push API][Link 4], [Troubleshooting Guide - Push/Reach][Link 23]
trans-unit.target: [API Documentation - Reach API][Link 4], [API Documentation - Push API][Link 4], [Troubleshooting Guide - Push/Reach][Link 23]

trans-unit.source: [Reach - Campaign][Link 27], [Reach - Criterion][Link 28], [Reach - Content][Link 29], [Reach - How To][Link 3]
trans-unit.target: [Reach - Campaign][Link 27], [Reach - Criterion][Link 28], [Reach - Content][Link 29], [Reach - How To][Link 3]

trans-unit.source: Four types of Push notifications
trans-unit.target: Four types of Push notifications

trans-unit.source: Announcements - allow you to send advertising messages to users that redirect them to another location inside your app or to send them to a webpage or store outside of your app.
trans-unit.target: Announcements - allow you to send advertising messages to users that redirect them to another location inside your app or to send them to a webpage or store outside of your app.

trans-unit.source: Polls - allow you to gather information from end users by asking them questions.
trans-unit.target: Polls - allow you to gather information from end users by asking them questions.

trans-unit.source: Data Pushes - allow you to send a binary or base64 data file.
trans-unit.target: Data Pushes - allow you to send a binary or base64 data file.

trans-unit.source: The information contained in a data push is sent to your application to modify your users' current experience in your app.
trans-unit.target: The information contained in a data push is sent to your application to modify your users' current experience in your app.

trans-unit.source: Your application needs to be able to process the data in a data push.
trans-unit.target: Your application needs to be able to process the data in a data push.

trans-unit.source: Tiles (Windows Phone only) - allow you to use the Microsoft Push Notification Service (MPNS) to send Native Windows Push containing XML Data.
trans-unit.target: Tiles (Windows Phone only) - allow you to use the Microsoft Push Notification Service (MPNS) to send Native Windows Push containing XML Data.

trans-unit.source: (Supported since SDK version 0.9.0.
trans-unit.target: (Supported since SDK version 0.9.0.

trans-unit.source: The final payload for tiles cannot exceed 32 kilobytes.)
trans-unit.target: The final payload for tiles cannot exceed 32 kilobytes.)

trans-unit.source: See also
trans-unit.target: See also

trans-unit.source: Concepts - Glossary
trans-unit.target: Concepts - Glossary

trans-unit.source: Three categories of Real time statistics shown for each campaign
trans-unit.target: Three categories of Real time statistics shown for each campaign

trans-unit.source: Pushed - how many pushes were sent based on the criteria specified in the campaign.
trans-unit.target: Pushed - how many pushes were sent based on the criteria specified in the campaign.

trans-unit.source: Replied - how many users reacted to the notification by either opening it from outside of app or closing it in the app.
trans-unit.target: Replied - how many users reacted to the notification by either opening it from outside of app or closing it in the app.

trans-unit.source: Actioned - how many users clicked on the link in the notification to be redirected to a new location in the app, to a store, or to a web browser.
trans-unit.target: Actioned - how many users clicked on the link in the notification to be redirected to a new location in the app, to a store, or to a web browser.

trans-unit.source: Note: More verbose campaign statistics are available from the via Reach API Stats
trans-unit.target: Note: More verbose campaign statistics are available from the via Reach API Stats

trans-unit.source: See also
trans-unit.target: See also

trans-unit.source: [Concepts - Glossary][Link 6], [API Documentation - Reach API - Stats][Link 4]
trans-unit.target: [Concepts - Glossary][Link 6], [API Documentation - Reach API - Stats][Link 4]

trans-unit.source: Campaign Details
trans-unit.target: Campaign Details

trans-unit.source: You can edit, clone, delete, or activate campaigns that have not been activated yet by hovering over their names or you can click to open them.
trans-unit.target: You can edit, clone, delete, or activate campaigns that have not been activated yet by hovering over their names or you can click to open them.

trans-unit.source: You can clone campaigns that have already been activated by hovering over their names or you can click to open them.
trans-unit.target: You can clone campaigns that have already been activated by hovering over their names or you can click to open them.

trans-unit.source: However, you can't change a campaign once it has been activated.
trans-unit.target: However, you can't change a campaign once it has been activated.

trans-unit.source: Reach Feedback
trans-unit.target: Reach Feedback

trans-unit.source: You can switch from the details to the statistics view of an open campaign that has already been activated and switch from the simple to advanced view of the statistics to view more detailed information (depending on your permissions).
trans-unit.target: You can switch from the details to the statistics view of an open campaign that has already been activated and switch from the simple to advanced view of the statistics to view more detailed information (depending on your permissions).

trans-unit.source: You can also use the reach feedback information from a previous campaign as targeting criteria in a new campaign.
trans-unit.target: You can also use the reach feedback information from a previous campaign as targeting criteria in a new campaign.

trans-unit.source: Reach Feedback statistics can also be gathered with “Stats” from the Reach API.
trans-unit.target: Reach Feedback statistics can also be gathered with “Stats” from the Reach API.

trans-unit.source: You can also customize the audience of your Push campaigns based on previous campaigns.
trans-unit.target: You can also customize the audience of your Push campaigns based on previous campaigns.

trans-unit.source: See also
trans-unit.target: See also

trans-unit.target: [UI Documentation - Reach - New Push Campaign][27], [API Documentation - Reach API - Stats][Link 4]
